text:
Hey Ariel, You can def do this. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables>
`{{request.full_url}}`   will give you the full url of the page being visited. You then jjust need to use a little bit of js to inject the url into the correct field.

Hello all. Does anyone have advice for how to include some third party CSS that comes from an NPM module - for example <https://necolas.github.io/normalize.css/>  - (so it can be bundled; rather than including it from a CDN)? Iâ€™d be looking to do this at either the module or theme layer. Thanks!
